question: Which of the following statements about asexual reproduction is correct?

options.a: always involves one parent but the offspring are genetically different from the parent
options.b: may involve two parents but the offspring is always identical to one parent.
options.c: always involves one parent and the offspring are identical to the parent
options.d: involves two parents but the offspring is not genetically identical to any of the parents.
